OOC: Don't you guys worry about the gun, I'll incapacitate it as soon 
as he gets caught.

Computer: We are now in high orbit. Thrusters at 33%. Position 
stabilized.

Yggdrasil: Good. Geoscan of the surface.

Computer: Geoscan starting... Done.

The holographic map of Earth showed where some bases were located. 
Unluckily, it didn't reveal anything else. None of the 
characteristics, no faction, nothing.

But Yggdrasil was worried about the number of bases. Five?!? There 
were supposed to be only Maximals and Predacons here! Choosing would 
be difficult...

Yggdrasil: Alright. Computer, aim pod launcher on these coordinates. 
Launch 15 seconds after my mark.

Before anything else, he relayed a remote detonator for the ship's 
laser to his comm system. He then got in the assault pod and had it 
moved in the launch tube.

Yggdrasil: Start launch sequence now!

Fifteen seconds later, he was hurled down at sound-breaking speed...

...only two klicks away from Rogues' ship.
